FuncDef: The display system tcam bank resource command displays the resource usage of each service. The display system tcam bank resource command displays the resource usage of each service.
CLIs: display system tcam bank resource [ slot <slot-id> [ chip <chip-id> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is an integer. You can enter the question mark (?) and select the value as prompted.

Specifies the ID of a chip.
The value is an integer. It must be the ID of an available chip.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display system tcam bank resource slot 1
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to view the resource usage of each service. If you do not specify the slot parameter, the resource usage of each service on all cards is displayed.
